name: SearchByLocation
description: Provides details of all restaurants that deliver to the specified location

Authorization.description: OAuth2 token issued for logged in consumer or API key issued to partner

Accept-Tenant.description: A valid country code, e.g. "uk". Filter search results to only include restaurants for the specified country. Required when using OAuth for authentication.

latitude.description: Filter search results to only include restaurants that deliver to the specified location

longitude.description: Filter search results to only include restaurants that deliver to the specified location

cuisine.description: Filter search results to only include restaurants that offer the specified cuisine

restaurantName.description: Filter search results to only include restaurants that have a name that matches the specified value

brandName.description: Filter search results to only include restaurants of the specified brand
